Package com.yantra.wms.japi.ue

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    WMSAdjustLocationInventoryUE  
    WMSBeforeAdjustInventoryUE
    User exit that serves as a mechanism for validating the Inventory adjustment.
    WMSBeforeChangeAttributesUE
    User exit that serves as a mechanism for validating the Inventory attribute changes.
    WMSBeforeCreateCountRequestUE
    User exit that serves as a mechanism for providing more information to createCountRequest API.
    WMSBeforeCreateLocationUE
    User exit that serves as a mechanism for providing more information to createLocation API.
    WMSBeforeCreateLPNUE
    User exit that serves as a mechanism for providing more information to createLPN API.
    WMSBeforeCreateMoveRequestUE
    User exit that serves as a mechanism for providing more information to createMoveRequest API.
    WMSBeforeCreateWaveUE
    User exit that serves as a mechanism for providing more information to createWave API.
    WMSBeforeCreateZoneUE
    User exit that serves as a mechanism for providing more information to createZone API.
    WMSBeforeDeleteLPNUE  
    WMSBeforeManageDockAppointmentUE
    User exit that serves as a mechanism for providing more information to manageDockAppointment API.
    WMSBeforeMoveLocationInventoryUE
    User exit that serves as a mechanism for validating the Inventory adjustment.
    WMSBeforePrepareForDepositUE
    User exit that serves as a mechanism to direct picker to a location where the picker is going to deposit the inventory.
    WMSCanChangeInventoryAttrsWithOpenTasksUE
    User exit that serves as a mechanism for validating the Inventory adjustment.
    WMSCanLocationBeSuggestedForPutawayUE
    User exit that serves as a mechanism for deciding whether the location can be considered for suggestion.
    WMSCanReleaseMoveRequestUE
    User exit that serves as a mechanism for providing more information to releaseMoveRequest API.
    WMSCircumventLooseContainerizationUE
    User exit that serves as a mechanism to circumvent(bypass) the system suggested loose containerization logic and invoke an external API (third party software) to perform loose containeriztion and suggest a list of containers for a list of SKU's.
    WMSGetFifoNumberUE
    User exit that serves as a mechanism for providing Fifo number for an item being created in inventory.
    WMSGetLocationPrioritySchemeUE
    User exit that serves as a mechanism for providing a scheme for prioritising the locations for put away.
    WMSGetPreferenceZoneListUE
    User exit that serves as a mechanism for re-prioritising/removing/adding the Zones from the priority zone list from which locations will be considered for put away location selection.
    WMSOverrideAssignLaneUE
    User exit that serves as a mechanism to override the lanes that were assigned to the shipment being created in inventory.
    WMSOverrideContainerizationCategoryUE
    User exit that serves as a mechanism to override the containerization category defined for the SKU during containerization.
    WMSOverridePickLocationAssignmentUE Deprecated
    This UE is deprecated as of Sterling Selling and Fulfillment Suite v9.1.
    WMSOverrideShipmentGroupUE
    User exit that serves as a mechanism for providing more information to overrideShipmentGroup API.
    WMSOverrideSuggestedContainerListUE
    User exit that serves as a mechanism to override the list of empty containers that has been suggested.The list of empty containers is selected based on buyer organization code, container category, node and enterprise.
    WMSSortShipmentLinesUE
    User exit that sorts Shipments Lines before processing by release Wave.
